desc: The Faerie Shop is located in The Enterprise Shopping Centre, Eastbourne, BN211BD and run by Susie & Liz. We now also sell crystals online and in our Eastbourne Store you can buy all things faerie: Crystals, Incense, Jewellery, Books, Oracle Cards, Candles & more! We are an independent crystal store!

layout.text: The Faerie Shop is located in The Enterprise Shopping Centre, Eastbourne and sells crystals, jewellery, vegan beauty & skincare products, vegan chocolate, holistic books, faerie items and much more!
